name: RAFAEL
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/r6NDTp9GrTbjUYsf8

Synopsis

10 years ago, Cyberpunk age was over. Artificial Intelligence has conquered the world. Human was quarantined at the military base. No one knows what caused it. Some said it due to mass world glitch. It was a total mess. One day, military built something to get rid of them. It was a success. The A.I was defeated. Movement control order is over and now humanity can go back to normal. Will Linda and his brother safely go back to their home? What’s happened to the world after 10 years
of isolation?
